p: 1-(4-methylbenzyl)-2-(4-nitrophenyl)cyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid (8). The product was obtained as a pale yellow oil in 47% yield after purification with methanol/dichloromethane (1:99). 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.20 (dd, J = 20.6, 11.5 Hz, 2H), 7.45 (d, J = 11.1 Hz, 2H), 7.14 − 6.98 (m, 4H), 3.18 (d, J = 15.7 Hz, 1H), 3.05 (t, J = 8.1 Hz, 1H), 2.34 (d, J = 9.4 Hz, 3H), 2.04 (dd, J = 10.8, 7.2 Hz, 2H), 1.63 − 1.53 (m, 1H). 13 C NMR (101 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 180.1, 147.3, 144.3, 136.1, 136.1, 130.3, 129.2, 128.6, 123.9, 33.2, 32.9, 31.6, 21.2, 19.5. HRMS (ESI): calculated for C 18H 16O 4N [M-H] 310.10738 found 310.10849.
